Text:
Yo bro' for hitting with da up
peace

I'm not sure what it says that the only 2 other ppl to leave comments about this truly insightful and enlightened piece of literature seem to have the grammatical command of a lobotomized mongoloid, except that you all should take note and dl this and comment for your own sake because it doesn't speak well for the rest of you.

...And, I'm not sure as to why Roc Strongo there would acknowledge an appreciation of the aforementioned material whilst on the other hand lay down derogatory comments that clearly contradict his intended impression and purpose of phrase. - Remember, a dog that chases his tail, moves only to trip his master :)
Thank you for your kindness of spirit in sharing this powerful work by one of the world's leading peacemakers.

Anything from the Deli Lama is worth the time and YES THANKS FOR THE UPLOAD.
I would like to see him RULE China. He is a very great speaker in person too.
thx for the up; good stuff!

Great stuff. I had the opportunity to sit in a room with no more than 20 other people and hear an informal talk by His Holiness. Later, I was introduced to him. He radiates kindness and profound understanding. A sense of humor, too.
